createGalleryForm.galleryNameRequiredDescription: Please enter a name for the new gallery.
createGalleryForm.invalidFreePhotoLimitDescription: Free photo limit must be 0 or greater.

createGalleryForm.freePhotoLimitDescription: Number of photos the client can select for free. They'll pay for additional selections.
